DataElement.preferredName: Patient Reported Outcome Question Difficulty Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to difficulty answering questions in a patient reported outcome assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Reported Outcome Question Difficulty Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to difficulty answering questions in a patient reported outcome assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Information collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptons, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

Concepts.definition: Information collected directly from a patient that typically includes subjective feelings regarding symptoms, functions in daily life, physical, mental, emotional, spiritual, and social well being, and satisfaction with his/her health care.

Property.preferredDefinition: A sentence of inquiry that asks for a reply; a request for information (e.g., a formal request to a database or search engine).:Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A sentence of inquiry that asks for a reply; a request for information (e.g., a formal request to a database or search engine).
Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were any of the questionnaires in the Geriatric Assessment - Healthcare Professional Questionnaire difficult for you to administer?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Were one or more items on the On-Study: Patient's Smoking History form difficult for the patient to recall and thus estimated?
